title.rendered: RBI response to govt on missed inflation target likely by November 11

content.rendered:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) will likely send its response to the government on the failure to meet the inflation target by next Friday, ahead of October’s inflation numbers that will be released on November 14, people familiar with the deliberations told ET.

The central bank is likely to point to supply-side constraints and external factors such as the Covid pandemic and the Russia-Ukraine conflict that led to a spike in commodity and fuel prices and high imported inflation due to t ..
